TopicTitle: How do I clean my cache on Chrome?

Articles.Content: as stated in title. I have heard that by cleaning your browser's cache, that it will run a little faster. How do I do this on Chrome?![:confused:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_huh.gif)

You can do this, and more, by installing and using CCleaner by Piriform. That also reduces the chances of you messing up something ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Alternatively:

[Chrome Help: Delete your cache and other browser data](https://support.google.com/chrome/answer/95582?hl=en)
